content:
<#595701895700676644> hi, great to finally meat such distinguished group , not sure who invited me, but i would just like to thank this person, and offer assistance to help make  crypto more secure , so tx for invite .. 

I am trying to learn discord.. UI os a bit confusing to me, and i have functional disability, so maybe us that, not sure ..  

W that,  i am not a programmer, i just have experience in consulting,   QA and QC, w hands on problem solving in different industries at all levels ,  inc in the financial industry.

Recently,  upon looking at ops  in the crypto industry, to recoup funds  lost to scams  lacking user security ( lets leave investor out ,if you indulge me )  , while investigating further, I would like to bring up for discussion
  
1- Security on programming interface  to the chain ,

2- Security on  DAPP,   to avoid rampant scams and fraud , w dev wares authentication,.

So need to find what sub groups  better address that . 

I see a real pathway to achieve such undertaking  , so please let me know  if anyone would  like  to explore remedies  to tackle about 4 billions in losses  , for last year . 

Tx for having me üëç
